pages.text: $(bgreen)Water Guard$() absolutely loves square dancing. There he is, a cube plant gliding across the dance floor making squares.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies$() in 5 * 5 range to attack itself. $(bred)Only live in water$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will gain a large amount of $(l)defence life$() to protecte itself.
